<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crimson Brand](/Equipment.aspx?ID=515)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 or 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Bastard Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15)
</row>

**Access** A character who is a member of the Knights of Lastwall has access to this option.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These ominous swords are decorated with crimson lacquer and serve as perfect conduits for the Crimson Oath’s power. The first was granted to Clarethe Iomedar by a mysterious patron who many Reclaimers believe to be an emissary of [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=126). A _crimson brand_ is a _+1 striking [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [bastard sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15)_. When the wielder uses the crimson brand to cast [_invoke the Crimson Oath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=556), they can generate a 60-foot line or a 30-foot cone instead of the normal 20-foot cone. Whenever the wielder would inflict [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on an undead creature with the _crimson brand_, they can instead wreathe the creature in ruby energy, inflicting the same amount of persistent positive damage instead of persistent bleed damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
